page.title: 09ACCOMMODATION IN THE AREA
page.content: In Lerryn and Golant there are a small number of homes offering{bed and {breakfast accommodation. There is only one{hotel}in the area, the Cormorant at Golant. There are two{public houses,}the Ship Inn at Lerryn and the Fishermans Arms at Golant. Both have gardens for the use of patrons and offer food and bar snacks. There are many holiday homes in the area, also flats and cottages, which are let for the summer season or throughout the year. There is a{Youth {Hostel}in Golant. It is possible to rent{caravans in the area, but they are to be found only in small numbers on farms. There are no large caravan sites.
